body:
Not sure if it is related, but I seem to be getting a SIGFPE as well. This is while trying seq2seq:

Program terminated with signal SIGFPE, Arithmetic exception.
#0  0x00007f4755d30d3c in tensorflow::functor::FillPhiloxRandom<Eigen::GpuDevice, tensorflow::random::UniformDistribution<tensorflow::random::PhiloxRandom, float> >::operator()(tensorflow::OpKernelContext_, Eigen::GpuDevice const&, tensorflow::random::PhiloxRandom, float_, long long, tensorflow::random::UniformDistribution<tensorflow::random::PhiloxRandom, float>) () from /deep/u/avati/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so
